title: What Can You Do with the ReGallery Plugin?
description: The ReGallery plugin helps you create attractive photo galleries on your website. It lets you display your photos beautifully and neatly, whether you're a photographer showing off your work, a business featuring products, or someone sharing personal memories.

title: Do I need technical skills to use ReGallery?
description: No, you don't need any coding skills to use ReGallery. It's designed to be user-friendly, allowing anyone to create and manage stunning photo galleries on their website easily.

title: How can I create a new photo gallery using ReGallery?
description: To create a new photo gallery with ReGallery, just go to your WordPress dashboard, click on ReGallery, then `Add New Gallery.` Upload your photos, arrange them how you like, customize settings, and add the gallery on your site using the ReGallery widget for any popular builder such as Gutenberg, Elementor, Divi builder or just add a shortcode.

title: Can I change the order of images within a gallery?
description: Yes, you can easily customize the order of images within a gallery. Simply drag and drop the images to rearrange them as you prefer.

title: Is ReGallery optimized for mobile devices?
description: Yes, the plugin is fully responsive, ensuring your galleries look amazing on all devices.
